sentences.en: Apposite to trust acceptance by consumers is their willingness to engage decisions about risk.
sentences.cn: 贴切的信任消费者接受是因为它们愿意参与对风险的决定.

sentences.en: I found his speech wholly apposite to the current debate.
sentences.cn: 我认为他的讲话对当前的辩论是恰到好处的.

sentences.en: Recent events have made his central theme even more apposite.
sentences.cn: 新近发生的事情使得他的中心主题显得更加有的放矢。

sentences.en: She thought in both languages, and selected the most apposite phrase from either.
sentences.cn: 她用两种语言思考，然后从中选择最贴切的一种表达。

sentences.en: Some transganglionic tracing labeled terminals following injections of BDA were apposite to the double | labeled neurons.
sentences.cn: 舌咽和迷走神经内注射生物素化葡聚糖胺(BDA)跨神经节标记的内脏神经初级传入终末点状膨体贴近双标记细胞胞体,呈紧密接触状.

sentences.en: That proverb is apposite to this case.
sentences.cn: 那谚语切合于这个情形.

sentences.en: The media and author are always defendants, while the apposite part are plaintiff.
sentences.cn: 媒体和作者总是处于被告地位, 而相对人总是处于原告地位.

sentences.en: Though it's an ancient art form, the aphorism is as sprightly and as apposite as ever.
sentences.cn: 尽管谚语是一种很古老的艺术形式, 但它依然是最为简洁贴切的表达法.

sentences.en: What he said is apposite to the case.
sentences.cn: 他所说的是切合实情的.
